Clarity Act: What is it?

The CLARITY Act (Digital Asset Market Clarity Act) is a significant 2025 U.S. Congressional bill designed to create a comprehensive regulatory framework for the digital asset market, defining roles for the SEC and CFTC by categorizing crypto assets (digital commodities, investment contracts, stablecoins) and establishing rules for exchanges, brokers, and dealers, aiming to bring clarity and U.S. competitiveness to the crypto space, building on the earlier GENIUS Act. 

‚úî Passed the U.S. House of Representatives ‚Äî July 17, 2025

‚úî Received in the Senate ‚Äî September 18, 2025

Current position: 
Waiting for Senate to Sign-off
Then the POTUS signs on it
Then the Law/Act is passed (expected early 2026)

All the big ETF players are no FOOLS to kick off their ETFs without the law being passed. They already know the ETFs have the government backing.

The question to ask‚ùì
Once the Clarity Act is passed, how will the markets look then..

Don't get left out, time to BUY and HODL is NOW.
